title: We need your ward jump crash reports!
body:
Have you crashed recently while ward jumping? 

We've heard scattered reports of players crashing when ward jumping, usually  while playing Lee Sin and Katarina -- not as much with Jax for some reason. This also seems to occur when you’re spamming either ward placement, ward jump (or just button mashing). 

If you've figured out any information on how to reproduce this crash consistently, please PLEASE let us know! Every bit of information helps! Even if you don’t know what you did, just hitting the “Send Report” button when you crash gives us meaningful data!

Thanks,

I've played 1,500 games as Katarina, and there are two events that happen in LoL that causes a small amount of lag that's unacceptable and able to kill me with no counter-play.

The first one has plauged MOBA's for as long as they've existed. The second one is a close second.

1. Karthus R
I wouldn't be the first person to want the frames on this stripped completely to avoid any possible chance of lag, while keeping this ancient ability in MOBA/LoL. Practically invisible with lux laser type line pls

2. Placing a ward myself.
Jumping to it has nothing to do with it. The problem is placing the ward is instant. The recovery time is enormous and random. The PROOF is in the ward jump. Go make a custom and ward jump 100 times. Despite anything, they are all different delays, even though I know you can face smash them instantly together. A macro would probably have inconsistent results.

3. Ping
Playing any of these champions at higher then normal ping furthers the issue of being able to place the ward. Interestingly, the ward hop fails to be as fast, again, but has higher results on performance. The shunpo follows the ward placement faster with less recovery between the two events at high ping.

If you could place a ward, at low ping, with no recovery, I would be consistently be ward hoping in the middle of teamfights, over peoples heads, dodging ultimate abilities and more of the ways flash can be used. "Recovery" however is nearly a suicide feature to the point that:
Yes, I bet it crashes games.

tl;dr 
GG it's the wards. Everyone wards. Wards = gamecrash, if you see someone ever place a ward, kat or not, attack them duh. they're frozen.

hey riot team, i saw in your comment that you said this bug is happening on katarina and lee sin, who both gain an additional effect upon completing their jumps but not so much on jax who just leap strikes and continues with no additional statistical effects.

i would recommend trying this on lee sin. attack a minion camp in the jungle using his q to engage from the other side of the wall rapidly fire off both actions on his e, ward jump back over the wall and flash back on to the camp side to trigger the minions auto attacks then reactivate his w. this will stack the largest amount of actions i can think of happening at one time on him, and if that doesn't trigger the crash then i think you will need to take it outside of lee sin, and into teamfights, where lots of actions are being executed at once, but in my opinion if it is more prevalent on lee sin and katarina then it is on jax then i would think it would have to do with the sheild/damage reduction these two champions gain after the rapid location change. if it is also happening on jax just way less often, i would look into trying ward jumping on jax with a rageblade in his inventory. that would bring jax into the same category as katarina and lee in that he would have a rapid location change then he would have a change in stats.

About as much counterplay as literally every dash and blink with 600+ range. Except it also costs 75 gold.

Especially considering that two of the three champions capable of ward jumping are pretty bad right now, and the third one's had his abiity to ward jump directly nerfed, I don't really see the need.
